title: ‘Never My Words’: No Monument Obsession or Giro GC Hype for Rewired Van Aert
content:
Van Aert maps out 2025 ambitions that include a Giro debut, a return to the Tour, and unfinished business in the monuments: 'That's what makes me hungry.'

Read the full article at ‘Never My Words’: No Monument Obsession or Giro GC Hype for Rewired Van Aert on Velo.
author: ahood
